content: High quality app of a fantastic board game. Perfect!
replyContent: Please open your game tomorrow. Snow will not be there.

content: This is one of the best quality adaptations of any boardgame. It has lots of playability even at times you don't have anyone to play with irl. There's an online feature so you can arrange games with people you aren't with. Single player Odyssey is a map taking you through matches with various gods with unique rule sets for how they move, build or impact opponents pieces. This gives lots of strategic depth which will need careful thought a few moves ahead. Have patience and you'll crack it.
The app is good, but it is very annoying with the snowing effect. Wish there was an option in the settings to disable it, but there's none.
AI is challenging. Easy to learn, hard to master. Gods & Goddesses varieties give a lot of game replayability.
Fantastic game and this electronic version is 5‚òÜ . Very well made and enjoyable to play with.

What an awesome adaptation, this is one of my favorite board games and I'm so glad I can now play anywhere, anytime I want, to all the people complaining about the cost including all the gods, it's 13 bucks, you spend that on lunch at McDonalds, thank you for making this available.

Im going with a 3 star, because I paid for this app, but there were a bit of inconveniences for me that needed developer intervention, which I believe should have been worked out in the testing phase of this game.
replyContent: Hello. The only issue was about the video tutorials. They were working since the beginning and as you can see no one is lamenting this issue. The  YouTube decided to change their APIs and this required an update of the app.

content: Very challenging AI
This is a great game with a very lengthy single player campaign along with multiplayer. Single IAP to unlock all 30+ characters. More board games like this please!

Buy the board game and don't waste money on this! Review: Otherwise great game but seeing as with most gods in odyssey you are forced to play against "godlike" opponents with complete counter god to yours, I'm gonna say it's a bad game with zero choice. Build for microtransaction. No online opponents to speak of. Way too hard to complete story mode if you haven't got the IQ of at least 130. Honestly, unless you're masochist, you'll most likely don't want to waste money even to buy this game.
replyContent: We are sorry you had this negative experience. Please join our discord channel and you will find support and a way to arrange online tournaments. https://discord.gg/6r5zhZU

content: Brilliant game!
Great implementation of the game as an app, its just a shame to have to spend some more cash to unlock all the characters, I guess I'll stick to my physical version

I love Santorini, it's an incredibly elegant game with few rules but very deep complexity. It's like chess, except that every game is completely different from each other, thanks to the 57+ god powers available. The game implementation is very good and the AI is very challenging... HOWEVER! The app is quite expensive - total of 14 ‚Ç¨ to unlock every god - and it's impossible to find online opponents (you can play with friends and AI). Great game, but the player base is so small...

Just started on the app, but have the physical game, seems great so far. This needs to be on the big screen. Please can you release a PC steam version or at least browser version, cross format will exponential boost players. Star Realms does this allowing players to buy one version and get access on all others.

This is one of the favorite game. In fact, we are planning to have a santorini tournament in our local gaming group to support this game. I hope someone from santorini developer may give us unique tokens as prizes for the tournament. I am willing to pay them as long as it's not very costly.
replyContent: Please join our discord channel and we can discuss about it: https://discord.gg/FpnmCaX

content: Nice game like the board game.

Santorini is an stellar game and this is a stellar app implementation of it. Yes, it costs money, but it is so so so worth it. The graphics are beautiful, the AI has many different levels of difficulty, the Odyssey mode (single-player campaign matches against AI) is great. I can't say enough good things. The only negative right now is that it can be hard to find a match with a real person because there isn't a very large user base yet. So if you're reading this, download the app and play!
replyContent: Thank you for your kind feedback. Please join our discord channel and you will find people willing to play online: https://discord.gg/FpnmCaX

content: Very familiar with the tabletop game, the app was just so clunky to use, even no Android emulator with a computer. can't play this on phone, barely play it on a tablet. Just unsatisfying compared to boardgame.
replyContent: Please join our discord channel to get support: https://discord.gg/6r5zhZU

content: All problems fixed and the developers have been super responsive to my input. Total reversal
replyContent: Hello, the issue with the videotutorial is now fixed. Please wait for the update to become available in Google Play Store. The issue was due to a change in YouTube APIs that was not supported by the YouTube Unity Plugin. Could you please let us know?

content: The fact you have to pay for the base game and then pay even more to unlock all the gods is crazy. I'd rather pay for the base game as a whole.
Terrific implementation, even better than I could have hoped for.
Purchased and returned this because it would not open. Got an error that it could not initiate the utility engine. Would repurchase if it worked.
replyContent: Please join our discord channel to get support: https://discord.gg/6r5zhZU

content: It's a cute game that's super easy to learn and takes some strategy to master. Nice to see a digital version of this boardgame. Thank u!
replyContent: Please join our discord channel and we will fix it: https://discord.gg/FpnmCaX

content: Love the board game but I'm not convinced the campaign is worth the money and there's a steep price to get all the gods. I've never managed to play a multiplayer game which means this is ultimately redundant. Maybe asynch play might have relived this issue. The cloud animation is distracting. Shame as this is a great implementation of the board game. Ultimately not worth it.
replyContent: Please join our discord channel to get support and arrange online tournaments: https://discord.gg/6r5zhZU

content: Excellent board game and great app. Learn to play the board game with other family members via this app. Worth every penny!!

It would be 5 stars without the weird... snow? clouds? falling across the screen constantly. They're very distracting and add nothing to the game. Further, they're not even shown in the advertising videos and images! What the heck are they, and why can't I turn them off??!! Arrrghhhhhhh!!!
replyContent: Hello. Thanks for your feedback. This effect is only played during xmas period and it's only one match over five. Sorry if it appears to be distracting... it will disappear automatically after 6th Jan.

content: 04 jan 2020 - OK now i REALLY LOOOOVE this app. My partner bought the gameboard for me this past christmas and his sister and i totally liked the game so i got the game app as well. thanks devs for fixing it! üòÅ 01 jan 2020 - i LOOOOVE the game but you really have to know that it's not the internet connection that causes the problems with tutorial video loading. perhaps its the link to the youtube video it's calling that has a problem. i want to give 5 stars but only when the problem is fixed.
replyContent: Hello, the issue with the videotutorial is now fixed. Please wait for the update to become available in Google Play Store. The issue was due to a change in YouTube APIs that was not supported by the YouTube Unity Plugin.

content: Why can't i refund?
replyContent: Can you please clarify what kind of issue are you experiencing? Thanks

content: I thought you'd be able to play against iOS users, but we have been unable to join each other's private rooms. Disappointing.
replyContent: Please ensure that both Android and iOS are on the same version number. You will be able to play together in this case. If you join our Discord chat, you will be able to find even more online matches: https://discord.gg/SF7xWxt

content: The app poses as another game to gain access to your private data. Really sketchy behaviour. And never loads on providing access!
replyContent: Please clarify your issue and we will be glad to help you. If you join our Discord channel, you will get a prompt support: https://discord.gg/SF7xWxt

content: Almost 5 stars, if it weren't for the absurd amounts of "decorative" clouds during the game that are seriously distracting. Let me turn these off, and easily get 5 stars ;-)

I love this game me except i haven't been able to play for a few days now because it won't open. I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling, and i have restarted my phone. Nothing seems to work. The app crashes at your company logo every time. Please fix this.
replyContent:
The issue was due to a change in Google‚Äôs API for accessing to the Google Play Games service that they implemented on their side, but it was not properly communicated to us.
I pushed the fix to production and it will become available soon (usually it takes less than one day for Google to approve), as version 1.108, for you to download and install

content: Boring real fast. I love the bgame but I think they completely ruined the occasion to make a great app. Campgn doesnt allow you to chose a God because the machup are premade by the game and you always start so its basicly playing chess against an Al that most of the time has a god that counters you. Personaly I bought the game to PvP but apparently no one plays this game because I have to wait all Day to find an opponent. Also you have to pay more money to have all Gods. They missed the target.
Best Game ever. Addicted to it really. Comparable to chess. Must have if you are into abstract games. This is one game where AI is as amazing to play with as real players.
replyContent: Please join our discord channel and you will be able to organize online matchup and to have your small bug fixed: https://discord.gg/FpnmCaX

content: Great game! I love it! I bought the expansion package. The game has enough different workers/gods with special moves and enough different play variants to make Santorini infinitely replayable!

This game is great but if I leave the app for too long it forgets the state of the game and I have to start from scratch. This really annoys me as I like to play for short periods at a time. Please save the current state before going to the background!
Fun strategic game. Really enjoy playing it

Very good implementation of the board game. Playing it made clear how some powers should work in the board game. I suggest putting the option for balanced match ups in local games, and a quick button to log the game after a game (for convenience).

Good board game, slick online implementation, kick-ass AI. And a responsive development team who stomps bugs. Thanks :-) Update/bug... Game play is fine, but achievements aren't working. Odyssey related achievements register, but god specific ones do not. At least, none of those I've achieved have unlocked... Poseidon, Charybdis...
replyContent: Hello, please consider that achievements can be earned only in online mode (not private match) and odyssey... but not in local mode. If you join our discord channel we'll be glad to clarify you about this.

content: Great game with great app. Very helpful app developer when u reach him at discord
replyContent: Online mode is working just fine, but the user-base is still growing. Make sure your app is updated to the latest version and check back often or just let it search for a few minutes. Join our discord. https://discord.gg/9PKUp7C There is a Find-a-Game channel where you can post that you're looking for an opponent. The community is very friendly!!

content: I am really bad at this game! My only issue is that achievements cannot be awarded in local mode.
replyContent: Hello, could you please specify what are the achievements that were not assigned to you? Please also note that achievements can be earned only in Odyssey mode or Online mode (but not private rooms) and not in Local Mode. Thanks

content: Easily the best phone game I've ever played. The AI can actually play the game and every god's power has custom effects. No pay to win or grinding or any of that nonsense either.
Fantastic game and dev team. Reported a bug and the team fixed it within 24h!

In real life i love this game. however this adaptation was unable to provide a consistent online experience as good as the Odyssey mode is i enjoy the grind of ranking up and such .. I kinda want a refund .
replyContent: Hello, could you please explain what kind of issue are you experiencing with online mode? Please join our discord channel and we will be able to fix your issue: https://discord.gg/FpnmCaX. If you join our discord channel we will be able help you, and if your problem is not solved, to refund you, if you want.

content: A very interesting and challenging game with just the right amount of difficulty. Contrary to other reviews, this game is not pay-to-win and all Odyssey battles can be won with good strategy. It has the depth of Chess while not being too overly complex. God/Hero powers provide insane replayability and variation to this Greek mythology-based tactical abstract game. Incredibly balanced, fast-paced and visually appealing.
Local mode freezes on a galaxy note 8 after selecting a second character... so I guess that means this app is useless now... great...
replyContent: We recently fixed a bug that was triggered by using random gods for both players in local mode. Will you please update and check to see if you're still experiencing the issue? You can also reach us through our discord channel: https://discord.gg/9PKUp7C. Could you please check and let us know? Thanks

content: I enjoy challenging strategy games like this that dont require a lot of reading since I'm usually listening to podcasts or audiobooks at same time. Splendor, Noch Mal, Doppelt so Clever are other good examples. Simple rules but God cards add enough variety to keep interesting. 10-15 mins a game is a nice length. Just ordered physical game! This is one of the better implemented ports of a board game. Not buggy, nor laggy. Graphics work well on phone size device. -1‚≠ê because AI too hard/errorless
Could you restore the pantheon pack (in app purchase I bought)for me...! It get lost after update?....p/s..problem is fixed..! Thanks!(9/9/19)
replyContent: Please join the discord channel and we will fix this. https://discord.gg/FpnmCaX

content: Quality product. Gameplay is smooth and fun. Developers are very helpful and willing to go the extra mile to help out with questions or bugs. I recommend to join the Santorini game discord server for faster and easier communication with the dev team.

Game is fantastic. Just having difficulty playing online. It seems the queue time is very long. I check my update whether if there is an update but it seems it is the latest. Maybe if there is an in game button to automatically check update that'll be great since playing online is very valuable.
I liked it, because I own this board game. Visuals awesome. Then I noticed In-App purchases to unlock other gods. Refunded.

Good game. Great graphics. God packs go on sale often which make the game $10 total. Very difficult/challenging even at the lowest novice level. Some tutorials are missing from the helper mode. The helper mode in general is very confusing. I don't understand half the functions.
replyContent:
Dear player, if you join our discord channel, we would be glad to explain you how to use the helper mode and maybe you could explain us your issues.

https://discord.gg/BpCe4fz

content: Great game but does not cross platform. Having the boardgame, thought it would be exciting to be able to play with my friends again now that we live far away. Sadly nothing happened and kept saying can not find room. I wasted money for nothing. Should have just gotten a Starbucks. To the developer response: We are both still on version 1.83 and still does not work. So spoke and played a game with one of the developers. Apparently iOS can only go upto 1.83, for now. Android has 1.85.
replyContent: Dear user. Multiplayer online between ios and android is supported. Just ensure that both app have the same version number.

content: I own the board game as well. The mobile version is great. nice non-disturbing animations and graphics.  the game plays comfortably. Clear explanation of the rules. Unfortunately I miss the 4 (and 3) player mode. I like Santorini the most when you can work together in couples. Second, I have never been able to find opponents online.  I am a bit concerned about the earnings model. Gods only bring extra rules and are too pricey. That does not predict much good if larger expansions are to come.

There's plenty of things I really like about it. Plays and looks great and all the tools built in make it real easy to teach. Fun little game where I can play a match in less then a half-hour. Graphical nit-pick here: Hydra and Nyx appears to have their low-res art used for their portrait art.

Five star game, but like so many others, I found the price structure off-putting. The initial price is absolutely worth it, but the price to unlock the rest of the content feels gouging. Over 10$ CDN for the other gods? For that price I can (and would) just buy the Android versions of Terra Mystica, Brass, Through the Ages, or Mystic Vale. Roxley, drop the expansions to a buck each and, if you have to, bump the game up a couple bucks. You'll have much happier and loyal customers.

4.5 stars. Same as the board game except solely 2 player. The AI is smart; 5 levels of difficulty and lowest is good. The amount of gods with the base game is really nice. The extras seem pricey but I'd pay that since it's so fun. Odyssey (campaign) could be longer. Online hasn't worked, I'm guessing due to lower # of players. One of the best board games and app games I've played, hours of fun. Worth it. If you're hesitant about getting the board game, get this first, then get the board game!
great game. too bad part is hidden behind transactions. also im really sad that there are too few people to find an online match.

Great and beautiful game. My only concern is that the godlike AI difficulty takes a long time to process its moves. Given the time it takes I thought it would be incredibly hard to beat but I beat it on my first time and I don't think I'm an expert player. Still highly recommend the game.

Great implementation, smooth play and very addicting but I can't forgive the pay to play nature once you buy the game. If you play the Odyssey (single player) mode you quickly get to a point where you have only 1-2 paths that you have to beat in order to get more challenges but those paths will have a expert(or similar) difficulty. The difficulty is fine and welcoming but it ramps up quickly and you realize to play more without suddenly becoming an expert you have to buy heros to get paths.
replyContent: Dear Wil, please consider that without purchasing additional gods you can still reach the end of the map and complete the odyssey mode getting your achievement on play games. The path that you can unlock with the base game has a progressive increment of difficulty. The same is with the gods that you purchase, they also increase AI level.

content: love santorini, have all available expansions at home, but one big problem. why is chaos not in the game? its my favorite god to play!
replyContent: Chaos will be part of future updates.

content: The game is fun. However, the difficulty in Odyssey mode is based on the fact you ALWAYS have to go first. The AI is designed to mess you up first then make plans for its win. Would be nice if there were random first player in Odyssey.
nice game

I love great abstract board games with stackable pieces like Santorini, Antagonism. But for a premium digital release I expect much more: Colorful animated pawns, zoom, up to 4 players (even against AI), exclusive animated sceneries, simple chat for multiplayer.
replyContent: Dear player, thanks for your interest in the app. Have you already seen the personalized god animation and sfx? We take note of your other comments and we will evaluate when to add them to our roadmap. Thank you

content: I'm giving this a 5 star because I love the game so much. I am just wondering if anyone has had success finding an opponent online? I've been trying to find an opponent but literally couldn't find any in 10 mins of search. Just wondering if it is because there is not a lot of people yet playing or is it a bug in the app?

Not bad. Had to pay more money to get all of the god powers. The Odyssey mode needs some work. The challenges range from laughably easy to near impossible depending the god line-ups that you are forced into. High quality game - only bugged out once so far.
replyContent: Please join our discord channel and we will be glad to help you: https://discord.gg/HdsC4td

content: Great graphics, love the panoramic spin around the board and the music is pleasant. The turn sequence is a little clunky, however, and having to purchase lots of additional gods, on top of the app price, is asking a lot. Also, the Odyssey quest seems quite rigged, forcing you to pay for other gods in an attempt to beat the AI in trickier contests or just to keep the game interesting in freeing up new paths. And... no 3 player or 4 player functionality unless you fork out more money, it seems.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback, and for trying Santorini! Just like the physical game, this comes with full functionality and a wide selection of gods, with more in expansions (these can be bought together for $7.99 for max savings). The app store image already states ‚ÄúINCLUDES 34 GODS!‚Äù. We‚Äôve updated the store description too, to make pricing clearer.

content: Forget about the cutesy graphics : this is at heart an abstract tactical game in the vein of chess or go. Simple to learn but hard to master absolutely applies here. And that's not even taking the special powers into account : the game is compelling enough without it, so for me the price of all the extra DLC powers aren't a bother (hint : it's STILL much cheaper than the board game+ expansion ;-)). I do miss the three and four player variant a bit, but even so : there's many hours of game here.

Very expensive. but You do get a premium product. just be sure to read the fine print. if you want the full game you need to pay extra. I don't think that you have communicated as clearly as you think. if I see a game that costs that amount, I assume there are no extra payments needed. Even writing including 36 gods included, doesn't mean that there are more gods. i don't mind giving you full feedback because of goodwill as a good company if you provide e-mail or phone number.
replyContent: Please join our discord channel here: https://discord.gg/fSS3Eay

content: Top performance. Represents the board game very well, and the powers are represented clearly, and are understandable.

$5 gets you the base game. Another $8 gets you all the Gods. I own the board game and was excited for the app version. I have to say it's a great port and control is very fluid. I feel like the app on its own is worth the $5, but asking ($2) for each God pack expansions loses a star. It doesn't add a ton of replay, just some variety. Making each expansion $1 seems a bit more fair. After all, there's gotta be a Golden Fleece expansion eventually. How much in app purchases will there be?

I have santorini board game and  play with my nephew many time .We like it about how beautiful of  game especially god power change every game while play. I buy fast when app release and purchase all god too. Now i can solo play and with other when go to outside. Really fun and happy.
replyContent: We're glad you like the game and glad to support for any problem you might have.

content: Easy to pick up, highly engaging with a lot of replayability. I love this monetization strategy: one time purchase expansions, although they are a tad pricey.

The game has been digitally developed much better than I was expecting, and I'm addicted. I can finally play the game on my commute, at work, and now with coworkers. The only issue I have is online mode stopped working today (couldn't find an opponent)after I played with two random opponents. I tried to connect from multiple networks and updated the app, but the game is saying I should ensure I update further. I'm sure it's a minor hiccup that will be sorted.

Great adaption of the physical game, which I already love. It's a fun, quick game for the family, easy to learn but tricky to master. Only issues I found were that quite often, the tutorial videos didn't play through to the end. Only after trying to repeat playing them several times did they eventually play through. Seemed to affect tutorials randomly. Other than that, I would still highly recommend to anyone who loves strategy board games. You won't be dissapointed.
Really nice - even has an Undo button!
replyContent: Thanks for appreciating the app. The undo functionality is in the game. You need just to hit on the hourglass :)

content: Great implementation, but missing a much desired online async mode common to mobile versions of board games. Microtransactions are expected with these type of apps, but is divided up strangely; be prepared to pay an extra $8 for all the current content. Lastly there doesn't seem to be support for more than 2 players; this is a small quibble since the game is best at 2p, but it lack of 3-4p does deviates from the physical version.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback, and for trying Santorini! Just like the physical game, this comes with full functionality and a wide selection of gods, with more in expansions (these can be bought together for $7.99 for max savings). The app store image already states ‚ÄúINCLUDES 34 GODS!‚Äù. We‚Äôve updated the store description too, to make pricing clearer.

content: Excellent board game implementation with fluid, attractive animations. Highly recommended!
Ticks all the boxes but leaves enough room for future updates too. Great game and great app, just the sort of things we need :)
Super happy to have this board game on mobile!

Just say the game costs $13, not $5. I logged in and didn't have all the God's, so I looked into the store and there they are in packs for $2 a piece or an all in at $8. I haven't even played the digital version of the game yet (LOVE the physical board game) so my review is based completely on getting clubbed while logging in.
replyContent: Hi Joshua! We‚Äôre glad you like Santorini; thanks for trying the app! Just like your physical copy, this includes selected gods & the option to buy more; the image in the store where you download this clearly states ‚ÄúINCLUDES 34 GODS!‚Äù in large print, since the first day. Thank you for your feedback. We‚Äôve updated the store description too.

content: This is an amazing game. I have the board game too. Its awesome to be able to play my buddy online now that he lives a time zone away. This was one of our favorites! For all that they put into the digital copy, the base game, campaign, online play, and private matches, it and the pack for all the other characters are well worth it! I'm so pumped this is out! It seems to play well. The AI doesn't seem easy to beat and I haven't played on hard yet.
Amazing game

This game is amazong, one of the best abstract strategy games, the graphics is so good, I have already the board version of the game and it is also awesome, I think every one should have and try this game.
great implementation gameplay-wise, but poor micro-transaction policy
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback, and for trying Santorini! Just like the physical game, this comes with full functionality and a wide selection of gods, with more in expansions (these can be bought together for $7.99 for max savings). The app store image already states ‚ÄúINCLUDES 34 GODS!‚Äù. We‚Äôve updated the store description too, to make pricing clearer.

content: So much strategy such wow! How do I insert memes to show how great this game is!?
amazing graphics, fun and dynamic gameplay, and lasts just the right amount of time for a mobile game!

I'm hesitant to give this as low a rating as 4, but i think you really need to rethink your microtransaction approach. The entry price is high enough as-is for a mobile game (but I understand- it took effort), and so I was very disappointed to find out I didn't even have access to all gods from base game unless I forfeited even more cash. I want to support Roxley and the game, but that just seems very cheeky to me. The game plays smoothly etc etc, but this pricing approach is a massive issue.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback, and for trying Santorini! Just like the physical game, this comes with full functionality and a wide selection of gods, with more in expansions (these can be bought together for $7.99 for max savings). The app store image already states ‚ÄúINCLUDES 34 GODS!‚Äù. We‚Äôve updated the store description too, to make pricing clearer.

content: So easy to learn and play ! and at the same time so deep in strategy and hours of fun !!! GREAT game
The graphics are beautiful, the gameplay is engaging, and the AI scales well to all skill levels. A treat to play,and a truly faithful adaptation ofthe tabletop game.
